Html:
So I descided to go for PHPExcel as the library to handle Excel files, and to make the smalles footprint in the production environment I am looking at what files need to be bundled for the system to work. There might be more files, but for those that know, would it be correct to assume:

/Classes/PHPExcel/Shared/PDF/Images/*.* <- all can be deleted
/Classes/PHPExcel/Shared/PDF/Fonts/dejavu-fonts-ttf-2.30/status.txt <- 1,2MB text file be deleted.
/Documentation/*.* <- All can be deleted
/Tests/*.* <- All can be deleted

The above would free up some 90MB of files for the final distribution.

Regards,
Kim Steinhaug, kim@steinhaug.com, www.steinhaug.no
